data.title: Early Round A Pipes Jumps from Four Ten and Screens
data.description: Here are two great ways to quickly get jump onto A Pipes at the beginning of the round, that allow you to either aggressively peek players pushing out from Attacker Spawn into A, or gain a timing advantage on players pushing out from Attacker Spawn into A.

data.title: Front A Site Spike Plant Delay / Retake Fast Lane
data.description: Here's a great way to use your Fast Lane to delay, or do damage to the enemy spike planter on B Site.

data.title: Early Round A Belt High Gear Jump from Four Ten
data.description: Here's a great way to jump onto A Belt from Four Ten at the very beginning of the round using your High Gear ability.
